actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Funeral Transportation and Living Expense Benefits Act of 1974 (88 Stat. 53) to also provide memorial transportation and living expense benefits to the families of deceased servicemen classified as prisoners of war or as missing in action.

summary.text: Provides, under the Funeral Transportation and Living Expense Benefits Act of 1974, for memorial transportation and living expense benefits payable to the families of deceased servicemen classified as prisoners of war or as missing in action.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Funeral Transportation and Living Expense Benefits Act of 1974 (88 Stat. 53) to also provide memorial transportation and living expense benefits to the families of deceased servicemen classified as prisoners of war or as missing in action.
